languages.text: Арлекин Ноктюрн Забвения однажды вновь посетил Простор. Пробравшись на самый Даргонус, он посетил дворец Вольного Торговца и оставил {mf|ему|ей} на хранение особый дар — ларец эльдарской работы, явно древний и ценный, украшенный руной с глазом, заключенным в треугольник. Что было сокрыто в том ларце, ведал{mf||а} лишь Лорд-капитан. Арлекин честно предупредил, что втягивает династию фон Валанциус в "опасный танец, рока сотрясенье, что мир заставит в ужасе застыть". Затем он отбыл в спешке, и не напрасно — убийцы из Темного города явились по его следам спустя пару часов и были безжалостно убиты. На броне их был знак кабала Черного Сердца.
languages.translation_comment:
Занни жив
Занни нам приятель
мы не присягнули Ктан

languages.text: The Harlequin known as Nocturne of Oblivion visited the Expanse once again. Sneaking onto Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left {mf|him|her} a special gift: a case of Aeldari crafting, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with the rune of an eye inside a triangle. Only the Lord Captain knew what it contained. The Harlequin candidly warned {mf|him|her} that he was drawing the von Valancius dynasty into "a deadly dance, a shaking doom, that all will freeze within the threads of terror's loom." Then he promptly departed, and not without reason — a few hours later, assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore the sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.
languages.original_text: Арлекин Ноктюрн Забвения однажды вновь посетил Простор. Пробравшись на самый Даргонус, он посетил дворец Вольного Торговца и оставил {mf|ему|ей} на хранение особый дар — ларец эльдарской работы, явно древний и ценный, украшенный руной с глазом, заключенным в треугольник. Что было сокрыто в том ларце, ведал{mf||а} лишь Лорд-капитан. Арлекин честно предупредил, что втягивает династию фон Валанциус в "опасный танец, рока сотрясенье, что мир заставит в ужасе застыть". Затем он отбыл в спешке, и не напрасно — убийцы из Темного города явились по его следам спустя пару часов и были безжалостно убиты. На броне их был знак кабала Черного Сердца.

traits.locale_text: The Harlequin Nocturne of Oblivion once visited the Expanse again. Sneaking on Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left a special gift with {mf|him|her}: a case of Aeldari make, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with a rune of an eye in a triangle. Only Lord Captain knew what this case held. Harlequin honestly warned {mf|him|her}, that he pulls the Vanalcius dynasty into "a dangerous dance, a shaking of doom, that'll make the world freeze under terror's loom". Then he promptly departed, and not without a reason. A couple of hours later assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore a sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

The Harlequin Nocturne of Oblivion once visited the Expanse again. Sneaking on Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left a special gift with {mf|him|her}: a case of Aeldari make, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with a rune of an eye in a triangle. Only Lord Captain knew what this case held. Harlequin honestly warned {mf|him|her}, that he pulls the Vanalcius dynasty into "a dangerous dance, a shaking of doom, that'll make the world freeze under terror's loom". Then he promptly departed, and not without a reason. A couple of hours later assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore a sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

languages.text: 名为“遗忘夜曲”的丑角再次造访科罗努斯扩区。他偷偷溜进达戈努斯，来到了行商浪人的宫殿，给{mf|他|她}留下了一件特别的礼物：一只艾达灵族制的箱子，古老而珍贵，上面画着一个三角型的符号，符号中间有一枚眼睛状的符文，只有领主舰长知道里面装的是什么。丑角坦率地警告{mf|他|她}，说自己正将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝拉入“一场致命的盛宴，一场颤抖的劫难，整个世界将在恐怖的织机下陷入动乱”。在这之后，他迅速离开了。他的离开并非毫无缘由——几个小时之后，来自黑暗之城的刺客开始追踪丑角的踪迹，但随后便死于非命。这些死亡刺客的盔甲上带有黑心阴谋团的标志。
languages.original_text: The Harlequin known as Nocturne of Oblivion visited the Expanse once again. Sneaking onto Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left {mf|him|her} a special gift: a case of Aeldari crafting, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with the rune of an eye inside a triangle. Only the Lord Captain knew what it contained. The Harlequin candidly warned {mf|him|her} that he was drawing the von Valancius dynasty into "a deadly dance, a shaking doom, that all will freeze within the threads of terror's loom." Then he promptly departed, and not without reason — a few hours later, assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore the sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

traits.locale_text: 名为“遗忘夜曲”的丑角再次造访科罗努斯扩区。他偷偷溜进达戈努斯，来到了行商浪人的宫殿，给{mf|他|她}留下了一件特别的礼物：一只艾达灵族制的箱子，古老而珍贵，上面画着一个三角型的符号，符号中间有一枚眼睛状的符文，只有领主舰长知道里面装的是什么。丑角坦率地警告{mf|他|她}，说自己正将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝拉入“一场危险的盛宴，一场颤抖的劫难，整个世界将在恐怖的织机下陷入动乱”。在这之后，他迅速地离开了。他的离开并非毫无缘由，因为几个小时之后，来自黑暗之城的刺客开始追踪丑角的踪迹，但随后却被人无情杀死。这些刺客的盔甲上印有黑心阴谋团的标志。

languages.text: Der Harlekin Nocturne des Nichts besuchte die Ausdehnung erneut. Er schlich sich auf Dargonus, kam zum Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und hinterließ {mf|diesem|dieser} ein ganz besonderes Geschenk: Eine von Aeldari hergestellte Kiste, unverkennbar alt und wertvoll, verziert mit der Rune eines Auges in einem Dreieck. Nur der Lord Captain wusste, was sich darin befand. Der Harlekin warnte {mf|ihn|sie} offen davor, dass er die Dynastie Valancius in einen "gefährlichen Tanz" zog und der Untergang drohte. Nur sagte er es in kryptischer Reimform. Dann verschwand er unverzüglich wieder, und nicht ohne Grund: Einige Stunden später tauchten Attentäter aus der Dunklen Stadt auf, die ihm auf der Fährte waren. Sie wurden gnadenlos getötet. Auf ihren Rüstungen war das Zeichen der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens zu sehen.
languages.original_text: The Harlequin known as Nocturne of Oblivion visited the Expanse once again. Sneaking onto Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left {mf|him|her} a special gift: a case of Aeldari crafting, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with the rune of an eye inside a triangle. Only the Lord Captain knew what it contained. The Harlequin candidly warned {mf|him|her} that he was drawing the von Valancius dynasty into "a deadly dance, a shaking doom, that all will freeze within the threads of terror's loom." Then he promptly departed, and not without reason — a few hours later, assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore the sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

traits.locale_text: Der Harlekin Nocturne des Nichts besuchte die Ausdehnung erneut. Er schlich sich auf Dargonus, kam zum Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und hinterließ {mf|diesem|dieser} ein ganz besonderes Geschenk: Eine von Aeldari hergestellte Kiste, unverkennbar alt und wertvoll, verziert mit der Rune eines Auges in einem Dreieck. Nur der Lord Captain wusste, was sich darin befand. Der Harlekin warnte {mf|ihn|sie} offen davor, dass er die Dynastie Valancius in einen "gefährlichen Tanz" zog und der Untergang drohte. Nur sagte er es in kryptischer Reimform. Dann verschwand er unverzüglich wieder, und nicht ohne Grund: Einige Stunden später tauchten Attentäter aus der Dunklen Stadt auf, die ihm auf der Fährte waren. Sie wurden gnadenlos getötet. Auf ihren Rüstungen war das Zeichen der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens zu sehen.

languages.text: L'Arlequin surnommé le Nocturne de l'Oubli revint dans les Étendues. Il se faufila dans le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur Dargonus et lui laissa un cadeau spécial : une boîte aeldari, indubitablement ancienne et précieuse, ornée d'une rune représentant un œil dans un triangle. {mf|Seul le seigneur-capitaine|Seule la seigneure-capitaine} savait ce qu'elle renfermait. L'Arlequin l'avertit sans ambages qu'{mf|il|elle} entraînait la dynastie von Valancius dans « une danse mortelle, une ruine violente, qui garrottera tous les êtres sous le joug de la terreur ». Puis il s'éclipsa promptement... et pour cause. Quelques heures plus tard, des assassins de la Cité Crépusculaire qui avaient suivi sa trace apparurent et furent éliminés sans pitié. Leurs armures arboraient le signe de la Kabale du Cœur Noir.
languages.original_text: The Harlequin known as Nocturne of Oblivion visited the Expanse once again. Sneaking onto Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left {mf|him|her} a special gift: a case of Aeldari crafting, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with the rune of an eye inside a triangle. Only the Lord Captain knew what it contained. The Harlequin candidly warned {mf|him|her} that he was drawing the von Valancius dynasty into "a deadly dance, a shaking doom, that all will freeze within the threads of terror's loom." Then he promptly departed, and not without reason — a few hours later, assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore the sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

traits.locale_text: Le Nocturne de l'Oubli revint dans les Étendues. Il se glissa dans le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur Dargonus et lui laissa un cadeau spécial : une boîte aeldari, indubitablement ancienne et précieuse, ornée d’une rune représentant un œil dans un triangle. {mf|Seul le seigneur-capitaine|Seule la seigneure-capitaine} savait ce qu'elle renfermait. L'arlequin l'avertit sans ambages qu’{mf|il|elle} entraînait la dynastie von Valancius dans « une danse dangereuse, une ruine violente, qui garrottera le monde sous le joug de la terreur ». Puis il s'éclipsa promptement... et pour cause. Quelques heures plus tard, des assassins de la Cité Crépusculaire qui avaient suivi sa trace apparurent et furent éliminés sans pitié. Leurs armures arboraient le signe du Kabale du Cœur Noir.

languages.text: El Arlequín conocido como Nocturno del Olvido visitó la Extensión una vez más. Se infiltró en Dargonus, en el palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y le dejó un regalo: una caja Aeldari, claramente antigua y valiosa, adornada con la runa de un ojo dentro de un triángulo. Solo {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán sabía lo que contenía. El Arlequín {mf|le|la} advirtió con franqueza de que estaba llevando a la dinastía von Valancius a «un baile letal, una lenta condena que todo helará bajo el terror que le espera». Se marchó inmediatamente después, y con razón: unas horas después, llegaron asesinos de la Ciudad Siniestra tras su pista, aunque fueron despachados rápidamente. Su armadura mostraba el emblema de la Kábala del Corazón Negro.
languages.original_text: The Harlequin known as Nocturne of Oblivion visited the Expanse once again. Sneaking onto Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left {mf|him|her} a special gift: a case of Aeldari crafting, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with the rune of an eye inside a triangle. Only the Lord Captain knew what it contained. The Harlequin candidly warned {mf|him|her} that he was drawing the von Valancius dynasty into "a deadly dance, a shaking doom, that all will freeze within the threads of terror's loom." Then he promptly departed, and not without reason — a few hours later, assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore the sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

traits.locale_text: El Arlequín Nocturno del Olvido visitó la Extensión una vez más. Se infiltró en Dargonus, en el palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y le dejó un regalo: una caja Aeldari, claramente antigua y valiosa, adornada con la runa de un ojo dentro de un triángulo. Solo {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán sabía lo que contenía. El Arlequín {mf|le|la} advirtió con franqueza de que estaba llevando a la dinastía von Valancius a «un baile peligroso, una lenta condena que helará el mundo bajo el terror que le espera». Se marchó inmediatamente después, y con razón: un par de horas después, llegaron asesinos de la Ciudad Siniestra tras su rastro, aunque fueron despachados rápidamente. Su armadura mostraba el emblema de la Kábala del Corazón Negro.

languages.text: 「忘却のノクターン」ことハーレクィンが再びエクスパンスを訪れた。ダルゴナスに忍び込み、自由開拓者の宮殿へとやってきた彼は、特別な贈り物を置いていった。それはアエルダリ製のケースで、三角形の中に目のルーンがあしらわれた、紛れもなく古代の貴重品だった。その中身を知っているのは、ロード・キャプテンだけだ。ハーレクィンは率直に、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が「死と踊り、恐怖の織りなす陰鬱な運命の下で凍てりつく」と警告した。そして、彼はすぐに去っていった。その数時間後、仄暗き都からの刺客が彼の足跡を追って現れたものの容赦なく殺された。彼らの鎧には 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉の刻印があった。
languages.original_text: The Harlequin known as Nocturne of Oblivion visited the Expanse once again. Sneaking onto Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left {mf|him|her} a special gift: a case of Aeldari crafting, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with the rune of an eye inside a triangle. Only the Lord Captain knew what it contained. The Harlequin candidly warned {mf|him|her} that he was drawing the von Valancius dynasty into "a deadly dance, a shaking doom, that all will freeze within the threads of terror's loom." Then he promptly departed, and not without reason — a few hours later, assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore the sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

traits.locale_text: 「忘却のノクターン」ことハーレクィンが再びエクスパンスを訪れた。ダルゴナスに忍び込み、自由開拓者の宮殿へとやってきた彼は、特別な贈り物を置いていった。それはアエルダリ製のケースで、三角形の中に目のルーンがあしらわれた、紛れもなく古代の貴重品だった。その中身を知っているのは、ロード・キャプテンだけだ。ハーレクィンは率直に、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が「死と踊り、恐怖の織りなす陰鬱な運命の下で凍てりつく」と警告した。そして、彼はすぐに去っていった。その数時間後、仄暗き都からの刺客が彼の足跡を追って現れたものの容赦なく殺された。彼らの鎧には 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉の刻印があった。

languages.text: Nisyan Noktürnü olarak bilinen Arleken, Enginlik'i bir kez daha ziyaret etti. Dargonus'a sızdı, Hür Tacir'in sarayına girdi ve ona özel bir armağan bıraktı: Aeldari yapımı, son derece eski, kıymetli, üçgen içindeki bir göz rünüyle bezenmiş bir sandık. İçinde ne olduğunu yalnızca Lord Kaptan biliyordu. Arleken, onu von Valancius hanedanlığını "ölümcül bir dansa, herkesin dehşetin dokuma tezgâhındaki ipliklerin içinde donacağı sarsıcı bir felakete" doğru çektiği konusunda tüm samimiyetiyle uyardı. Ardından hemen oradan ayrıldı, ayrılma sebebi de çok geçmeden belli oldu. İzini süren Kara Şehir suikastçıları, birkaç saat sonra ortaya çıkıp acımasızca katledildi. Zırhlarında Kara Yürek Kabalı'nın işaretini taşıyorlardı.
languages.original_text: The Harlequin known as Nocturne of Oblivion visited the Expanse once again. Sneaking onto Dargonus, he came to the Rogue Trader's palace and left {mf|him|her} a special gift: a case of Aeldari crafting, unmistakably ancient and precious, adorned with the rune of an eye inside a triangle. Only the Lord Captain knew what it contained. The Harlequin candidly warned {mf|him|her} that he was drawing the von Valancius dynasty into "a deadly dance, a shaking doom, that all will freeze within the threads of terror's loom." Then he promptly departed, and not without reason — a few hours later, assassins from the Dark City appeared, following his trail, and were mercilessly killed. Their armour bore the sign of the Kabal of the Black Heart.

traits.locale_text: Nisyan Noktürnü olarak bilinen Arleken, Enginlik'i bir kez daha ziyaret etti. Dargonus'a sızdı, Hür Tacir'in sarayına girdi ve ona özel bir armağan bıraktı: Aeldari yapımı, son derece eski, son derece değerli, üçgen içindeki bir göz rünüyle bezenmiş bir sandık. İçinde ne olduğunu yalnızca Lord Kaptan biliyordu. Arleken tüm samimiyetiyle von Valancius hanedanlığının "ölümcül bir dansa, herkesin dehşetin dokuma tezgâhındaki ipliklerin içinde donacağı sarsıcı bir felakete" doğru çektiği konusunda uyarıda bulundu. Ardından hemen oradan ayrıldı ve ayrılma sebebi çok geçmeden belli oldu. Birkaç saat sonra izini süren Kara Şehir suikastçıları ortaya çıktı ve acımasızca katledildiler. Zırhlarında Siyah Yürek Kabalı simgesini taşıyorlardı.

languages.translation_comment:
Занни жив
Занни нам приятель
мы не присягнули Ктан
